amendment.description: At the end of the bill (before the short title), insert the following: SEC. __. None of the funds made available by this Act may be used to provide an aggregate number of more than 50 printed copies of any edition of the United States Code to all offices of the House of Representatives.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 6 printed in House Report 112-518 to limit the print copies of the U.S. Code for the House of Representatives to 50 copies.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Harper amendment (A006) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A006) offered by Mr. Harper.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Harper amendment (A006) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
